mapper.select: select * from rooms left outer join roomoptions on rooms.room_num = roomoptions.room_num order by rooms.room_num desc
select * from rooms left outer join roomoptions on rooms.room_num = roomoptions.room_num where rooms.room_num=#{roomNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms (room_num, room_name, guests, room_reg_date, room_content, room_type, room_price, room_image1, room_image2, room_image3) VALUES (Room_Seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guests,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{roomContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{roomImage1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImage2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImage3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO ROOMOPTIONS (room_num, opt_no) VALUES (Room_Seq.currval, #{optNo , jdbcType=NUMERIC})
